text: I'm David Pogue you know we techno
freaks have a reputation for being
non-athletic indoorsy types like most
Americans we really should move more
that's the idea behind the Nike Fuel
band and the jawbone up band a motion
sensor inside tracks your activity you
track your progress on your iPhone and
you can share your stats with friends
motivation through humiliation I'm torn
the nike band has a screen so you can
see your stats without eating the phone
and it syncs wirelessly over bluetooth
which is fantastic to upload the up
band's data on the other hand you have
to take it off unplug this little cap
which you're gonna lose open the app
plug it into the headphone jack and then
reverse all that it's just so 1998 but
the up band has a 10-day battery life
it's waterproof and it tracks not just
movement but also your sleep patterns
which is extremely useful you can also
photograph what you eat if you're really
obsessive both of these bands really do
inspire you to move more it worked for
me nobody would call me a non-athletic
indoorsy type now
